main_story.title: Project 521: The Discovery
main_story.description: The main narrative following the Mars research team's discovery of pre-life artifacts and encrypted data that suggests reality itself may be a simulation. As they uncover the truth, they must navigate Foundation conspiracy, cult manipulation, and the fundamental question of what makes consciousness authentic.
main_story.logline: When a Mars research team discovers evidence that reality is a simulation, they must navigate conspiracy, cult manipulation, and their own identity crises while deciding whether humanity deserves the truth.
themes: Is comfortable illusion better than harsh truth?
How do power structures exploit human vulnerability?
Can individuals maintain agency in controlled systems?
